title: nuco.cloud
author: nuco.cloud
content: We're excited to share the biggest news in the history of nuco.cloud! nuco.cloud GO UpdateOur team has been working tirelessly on a major update to one of our products, and we're thrilled to announce that the testnet will go live for Windows users next week.Not only that, but computing power will go towards the folding@home BOINC project for testing, and active contributors will receive an airdrop of a real (mainnet) NUCO Token when we go live. We'll be testing the testnet for min. the next 4 weeks, so be sure to join our Telegram group for the latest updates and news
